amendment.description: Amendment requires GAO to report to Congress not later than 5 years after enactment of the Act to assess the impact of the legislation on privacy and civil liberties.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 114-88 to provide for a Government Accountability Office (GAO) report to Congress 5 years after enactment to assess the impact of this act on privacy and civil liberties.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 405 - 8 (Roll no. 171).

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 405 - 8 (Roll no. 171).
